description.value:
Trigger You successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] creature.

You give a throaty growl to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] a creature you just found. You don't take the -4 penalty for not sharing a language with the creature.
